00030 OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::OrdinaryDifferentialEquations(void)
00031 {   
00032    // Runge-Kutta method parameters
00033 
00034    numberOfPoints = 1001;
00035 
00036    // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg method parameters
00037 
00038    tolerance = 1.0e-9;
00039 
00040    initialSize = 1000;
00041    warningSize = 1000000;
00042    errorSize = 1000000000;
00043 
00044    display = true;
00045 }

00208 // void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00209 // Vector<double>& x, Vector<double>& y, 
00210 // double (*f)(double, double),

00228 
00229 void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00230 Vector<double>& x, 
00231 Vector<double>& y, 
00232 double (*f)(double, double), 
00233 double a, double b, double ya)
00234 {
00235    // Integration step
00236 
00237    double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00238 
00239    // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00240 
00241    Vector<double> k(4);
00242 
00243    // Independent variable
00244 
00245    x[0] = a;
00246 
00247    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00248    {
00249       x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00250    }
00251 
00252    x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00253 
00254    // Dependent variable
00255 
00256    y[0] = ya;
00257 
00258    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00259    {   
00260       // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00261 
00262       k[0] = f(x[i], y[i]);
00263       k[1] = f(x[i]+h/2.0, y[i]+h*k[0]/2.0);
00264       k[2] = f(x[i]+h/2.0, y[i]+h*k[1]/2.0);
00265       k[3] = f(x[i+1], y[i]+h*k[2]);
00266 
00267       // Dependent variable
00268 
00269       y[i+1] = y[i] + h*(k[0] + 2.0*k[1] + 2.0*k[2] + k[3])/6.0;
00270    }
00271 }
00272

00274 // void getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00275 // double (*f1)(double, double, double), 
00276 // double (*f2)(double, double,double),
00277 // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00278 // double, double, double) method
00279 //
00300 
00301 void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00302 Vector<double>& x, 
00303 Vector<double>& y1, 
00304 Vector<double>& y2, 
00305 double (*f1)(double, double,double), 
00306 double (*f2)(double, double,double), 
00307 double a, double b, 
00308 double y1a, double y2a)
00309 {
00310    // Integration step
00311 
00312    double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00313 
00314    // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00315 
00316    Vector<double> k1(4);
00317    Vector<double> k2(4);
00318 
00319    // Independent variable
00320 
00321    x[0] = a;
00322 
00323    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00324    {
00325       x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00326    }
00327 
00328    x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00329 
00330    // Dependent variables
00331   
00332    y1[0] = y1a;
00333    y2[0] = y2a;
00334 
00335    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00336    {
00337       // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00338 
00339       k1[0] = f1(x[i], y1[i], y2[i]);
00340       k2[0] = f2(x[i], y1[i], y2[i]);
00341 
00342       k1[1] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0);
00343       k2[1] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0);
00344 
00345       k1[2] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0);
00346       k2[2] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0);
00347 
00348       k1[3] = f1(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2]);
00349       k2[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2]);
00350 
00351       // Dependent variables
00352 
00353       y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00354       y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00355    }
00356 }

00392 
00393 void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00394 Vector<double> &x, 
00395 Vector<double>& y1, 
00396 Vector<double>& y2, 
00397 Vector<double>& y3, 
00398 double (*f1)(double, double, double, double), 
00399 double (*f2)(double, double, double, double), 
00400 double (*f3)(double, double, double, double), 
00401 double a, double b, 
00402 double y1a, double y2a, double y3a)
00403 {
00404    // Integration step
00405 
00406    double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00407 
00408    // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00409 
00410    Vector<double> k1(4);
00411    Vector<double> k2(4);
00412    Vector<double> k3(4);
00413 
00414    // Independent variable
00415 
00416    x[0] = a;
00417 
00418    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00419    {
00420       x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00421    }
00422 
00423    x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00424 
00425    // Dependent variables
00426 
00427    y1[0] = y1a;
00428    y2[0] = y2a;
00429    y3[0] = y3a;
00430 
00431    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00432    {
00433       // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00434 
00435       k1[0] = f1(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00436       k2[0] = f2(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00437       k3[0] = f3(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00438 
00439       k1[1] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00440       k2[1] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00441       k3[1] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00442 
00443       k1[2] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00444       k2[2] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00445       k3[2] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00446 
00447       k1[3] = f1(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00448       k2[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00449       k3[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00450 
00451       // Dependent variables
00452 
00453       y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00454       y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00455       y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00456    }
00457 }

00498 
00499 void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00500 Vector<double>& x, 
00501 Vector<double>& y1, 
00502 Vector<double>& y2, 
00503 Vector<double>& y3, 
00504 Vector<double>& y4, 
00505 double (*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00506 double (*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00507 double (*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00508 double (*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00509 double a, double b, 
00510 double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a)
00511 {
00512    // Integration step
00513 
00514    double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00515 
00516    // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00517 
00518    Vector<double> k1(4);
00519    Vector<double> k2(4);
00520    Vector<double> k3(4);
00521    Vector<double> k4(4);
00522 
00523    // Independent variable
00524 
00525    x[0] = a;
00526 
00527    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00528    {
00529       x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00530    }
00531 
00532    x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00533 
00534    // Dependent variables
00535 
00536    y1[0] = y1a;
00537    y2[0] = y2a;
00538    y3[0] = y3a;
00539    y4[0] = y4a;
00540 
00541    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00542    {
00543       // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00544 
00545       k1[0] = f1(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00546       k2[0] = f2(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00547       k3[0] = f3(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00548       k4[0] = f4(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00549 
00550       k1[1] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00551       y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, 
00552       y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, 
00553       y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, 
00554       y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00555 
00556       k2[1] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00557       y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, 
00558       y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, 
00559       y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, 
00560       y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00561 
00562       k3[1] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00563       y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, 
00564       y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, 
00565       y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, 
00566       y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00567 
00568       k4[1] = f4(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00569       y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, 
00570       y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, 
00571       y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, 
00572       y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00573 
00574       k1[2] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00575       y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, 
00576       y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, 
00577       y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, 
00578       y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00579 
00580       k2[2] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00581       y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, 
00582       y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, 
00583       y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, 
00584       y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00585 
00586       k3[2] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00587       y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, 
00588       y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, 
00589       y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, 
00590       y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00591 
00592       k4[2] = f4(x[i]+h/2.0, 
00593       y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, 
00594       y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, 
00595       y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, 
00596       y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00597 
00598       k1[3] = f1(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00599       k2[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00600       k3[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00601       k4[3] = f4(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00602 
00603       // Dependent variables
00604 
00605       y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00606       y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00607       y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00608       y4[i+1] = y4[i] + h*(k4[0] + 2.0*k4[1] + 2.0*k4[2] + k4[3])/6.0;
00609    }
00610 }

00613 // void getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00614 // double (*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00615 // double (*f2)(double, double, double, double, double),
00616 // double (*f3)(double, double, double, double, double),   
00617 // double (*f4)(double, double, double, double, double),   
00618 // Vector<double>&, 
00619 // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00620 // double, double, double, double, double, double) method
00621 
00655 
00656 void OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::getRungeKuttaIntegral(
00657 Vector<double>& x, 
00658 Vector<double>& y1, 
00659 Vector<double>& y2, 
00660 Vector<double>& y3, 
00661 Vector<double>& y4, 
00662 Vector<double>& y5, 
00663 double (*f1)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00664 double (*f2)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00665 double (*f3)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00666 double (*f4)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00667 double (*f5)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00668 double a, double b, 
00669 double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a, double y5a)
00670 {
00671    // Integration step
00672 
00673    double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00674 
00675    // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00676 
00677    Vector<double> k1(4);
00678    Vector<double> k2(4);
00679    Vector<double> k3(4);
00680    Vector<double> k4(4);
00681    Vector<double> k5(4);
00682 
00683    // Independent variable
00684 
00685    x[0] = a;
00686 
00687    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00688    {
00689       x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00690    }
00691 
00692    x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00693 
00694    // Dependent variables
00695 
00696    y1[0] = y1a;
00697    y2[0] = y2a;
00698    y3[0] = y3a;
00699    y4[0] = y4a;
00700    y5[0] = y5a;
00701 
00702    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00703    {
00704       // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00705 
00706       k1[0] = f1(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00707       k2[0] = f2(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00708       k3[0] = f3(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00709       k4[0] = f4(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00710       k5[0] = f5(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00711 
00712       k1[1] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00713       k2[1] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00714       k3[1] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00715       k4[1] = f4(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00716       k5[1] = f5(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00717 
00718       k1[2] = f1(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00719       k2[2] = f2(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00720       k3[2] = f3(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00721       k4[2] = f4(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00722       k5[2] = f5(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00723 
00724       k1[3] = f1(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00725       k2[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00726       k3[3] = f2(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00727       k4[3] = f4(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00728       k5[3] = f5(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00729 
00730       // Dependent variables
00731 
00732       y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00733       y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00734       y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00735       y4[i+1] = y4[i] + h*(k4[0] + 2.0*k4[1] + 2.0*k4[2] + k4[3])/6.0;
00736       y5[i+1] = y5[i] + h*(k5[0] + 2.0*k5[1] + 2.0*k5[2] + k5[3])/6.0;
00737    }
00738 }
00739 
00740 
00741 // int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(Vector<double>& x, Vector<double>& y, 
00742 // double (*f)(double, double), 
00743 // double a, double b, double ya) method
00744 
00761 
00762 int OrdinaryDifferentialEquations
00763 ::calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& yOut, 
00764 double (*f)(double, double), double a, double b, double ya)
00765 {
00766    double error = 0.0;
00767 
00768    int count = 0;
00769    int size = initialSize;
00770 
00771    Vector<double> tempX(size);
00772    Vector<double> tempY(size);
00773 
00774    tempX[0] = a;
00775    tempY[0] = ya;
00776 
00777    count++;
00778 
00779    double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00780 
00781    double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
00782    double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
00783    double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
00784    double a5 = 1.0;
00785    double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
00786 
00787    double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
00788    double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
00789    double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
00790    double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
00791    double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
00792    double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
00793    double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
00794    double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
00795    double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
00796    double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
00797    double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
00798    double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
00799    double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
00800    double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
00801    double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
00802    
00803    double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
00804    double c42 = 0.0;
00805    double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
00806    double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
00807    double c45 = 0.0;
00808    double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
00809 
00810    double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
00811    double c52 = 0.0;  
00812    double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
00813    double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
00814    double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
00815    double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
00816 
00817    double d1 = c41 - c51;
00818    double d2 = c42 - c52;
00819    double d3 = c43 - c53;
00820    double d4 = c44 - c54;
00821    double d5 = c45 - c55;
00822    double d6 = c46 - c56;
00823 
00824    double k1 = 0.0;
00825    double k2 = 0.0;
00826    double k3 = 0.0;
00827    double k4 = 0.0;
00828    double k5 = 0.0;
00829    double k6 = 0.0;
00830 
00831    // Main loop
00832 
00833    double x = a;
00834    double y = ya;
00835 
00836    double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00837 
00838    double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
00839 
00840    while(x < b)
00841    { 
00842       // Set smallest allowable stepsize
00843 
00844       hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00845 
00846       if(h < hmin)
00847       {
00848          std::cout << std::endl
00849                    << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
00850                    << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00851                    << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
00852                    << std::endl;
00853 
00854          h = hmin;
00855       }
00856 
00857       if(x + h > b)
00858       {
00859          h = b - x;
00860       }
00861 
00862       // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
00863 
00864       k1 = h*f(x, y);
00865       k2 = h*f(x+a2*h, y+b21*k1);
00866       k3 = h*f(x+a3*h, y+b31*k1+b32*k2);
00867       k4 = h*f(x+a4*h, y+b41*k1+b42*k2+b43*k3); 
00868       k5 = h*f(x+a5*h, y+b51*k1+b52*k2+b53*k3+b54*k4); 
00869       k6 = h*f(x+a6*h, y+b61*k1+b62*k2+b63*k3+b64*k4+b65*k5);
00870 
00871       // Error estimate
00872 
00873       error = fabs(d1*k1+d2*k2+d3*k3+d4*k4+d5*k5+d6*k6);
00874 
00875       if(error <= tolerance)
00876       {
00877          x += h;
00878          y += c51*k1+c52*k2+c53*k3+c54*k4+c55*k5+c56*k6;
00879 
00880          tempX[count] = x;
00881          tempY[count] = y;
00882 
00883          count++;
00884 
00885          if(error != 0.0)
00886          {
00887             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);      
00888          }
00889 
00890          if(count >= size)
00891          {
00892             std::cerr << std::endl
00893                       << "Flood Error: calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00894                       << "Insufficient memory reserved." << std::endl
00895                       << std::endl;
00896 
00897             exit(1);
00898          }
00899       }
00900       else
00901       {
00902          h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
00903       }
00904    }// end while loop   
00905 
00906    Vector<double> newX(count);
00907    Vector<double> newY(count);
00908 
00909    for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
00910    {
00911       newX[i] = tempX[i];
00912       newY[i] = tempY[i];
00913    }
00914 
00915    xOut = newX;
00916    yOut = newY;
00917 
00918    return(count);
00919 }

00922 // int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00923 // double (*f1)(double, double, double), 
00924 // double (*f2)(double, double, double), 
00925 // double, double, double, double)
00926 
00948 
00949 int OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(
00950 Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& y1Out, Vector<double>& y2Out, 
00951 double (*f1)(double, double, double), 
00952 double (*f2)(double, double, double), 
00953 double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a)
00954 {
00955    double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0;
00956 
00957    int count = 0;
00958    int size = initialSize;
00959 
00960    Vector<double> tempX(size);
00961    Vector<double> tempY1(size);
00962    Vector<double> tempY2(size);
00963 
00964    tempX[0] = a;
00965 
00966    tempY1[0] = y1a;
00967    tempY2[0] = y2a;
00968 
00969    count++;
00970 
00971    double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00972 
00973    double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
00974    double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
00975    double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
00976    double a5 = 1.0;
00977    double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
00978 
00979    double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
00980    double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
00981    double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
00982    double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
00983    double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
00984    double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
00985    double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
00986    double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
00987    double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
00988    double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
00989    double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
00990    double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
00991    double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
00992    double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
00993    double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
00994 
00995    double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
00996    double c42 = 0.0;
00997    double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
00998    double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
00999    double c45 = 0.0;
01000    double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01001 
01002    double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01003    double c52 = 0.0;  
01004    double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01005    double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01006    double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01007    double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01008 
01009    double d1 = c41 - c51;
01010    double d2 = c42 - c52;
01011    double d3 = c43 - c53;
01012    double d4 = c44 - c54;
01013    double d5 = c45 - c55;
01014    double d6 = c46 - c56;
01015 
01016    double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0;
01017    double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0;
01018    double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0;
01019    double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0;
01020    double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0;
01021    double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0;
01022 
01023    // Main loop
01024 
01025    double x = a;
01026    double y1 = y1a;
01027    double y2 = y2a;
01028 
01029    double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01030 
01031    double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01032 
01033    while(x < b)
01034    {
01035       // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01036 
01037       hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01038 
01039       if(h < hmin)
01040       {
01041          std::cout << std::endl
01042                    << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01043                    << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01044                    << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01045                    << std::endl;
01046 
01047        h = hmin;
01048       }
01049 
01050       if(x + h > b)
01051       {
01052          h = b - x;
01053       }
01054 
01055       // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01056 
01057       k11 = h*f1(x, y1, y2);
01058       k21 = h*f2(x, y1, y2);
01059 
01060       k12 = h*f1(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01061       k22 = h*f2(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01062 
01063       k13 = h*f1(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01064       k23 = h*f2(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01065 
01066       k14 = h*f1(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01067       k24 = h*f2(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01068 
01069       k15 = h*f1(x+a5*h, 
01070       y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, 
01071       y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01072 
01073       k25 = h*f2(x+a5*h, 
01074       y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, 
01075       y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01076 
01077       k16 = h*f1(x+a6*h, 
01078       y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, 
01079       y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01080 
01081       k26 = h*f2(x+a6*h, 
01082       y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, 
01083       y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01084 
01085       // Error estimate
01086 
01087       error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01088       error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01089 
01090       error = 0.0;
01091       if(error1 > error)
01092       {
01093          error = error1;
01094       }
01095       if(error2 > error)
01096       {
01097          error = error2;
01098       }
01099 
01100       if(error <= tolerance)
01101       {
01102          x += h;
01103          y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01104          y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01105 
01106          tempX[count] = x;
01107          tempY1[count] = y1;
01108          tempY2[count] = y2;
01109          count++;
01110 
01111          if(error != 0.0)
01112          {
01113             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01114          }
01115 
01116          if(count >= size)
01117          {
01118             std::cerr << std::endl
01119                       << "Flood Error: calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01120                       << "Insufficient memory reserved." << std::endl
01121                       << std::endl;
01122 
01123             exit(1);
01124          }
01125       }
01126       else
01127       {
01128          h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
01129       }
01130    } // end while loop   
01131 
01132    Vector<double> newX(count);
01133    Vector<double> newY1(count);
01134    Vector<double> newY2(count);
01135 
01136    for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01137    {
01138       newX[i] = tempX[i];
01139       newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01140       newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01141    }
01142 
01143    xOut = newX;
01144    y1Out = newY1;
01145    y2Out = newY2;
01146 
01147    return(count);
01148 }

01156 // double, double, double, double, double) method

01183 
01184 int OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(
01185 Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& y1Out, Vector<double>& y2Out, Vector<double>& y3Out,
01186 double (*f1)(double, double, double, double), 
01187 double (*f2)(double, double, double, double), 
01188 double (*f3)(double, double, double, double), 
01189 double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a)
01190 {
01191    double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0, error3 = 0.0;
01192 
01193    int size = initialSize;
01194 
01195    int count = 0;
01196 
01197    Vector<double> tempX(size);
01198    Vector<double> tempY1(size);
01199    Vector<double> tempY2(size);
01200    Vector<double> tempY3(size);
01201 
01202    tempX[0] = a;
01203 
01204    tempY1[0] = y1a;
01205    tempY2[0] = y2a;
01206    tempY3[0] = y3a;
01207 
01208    count++;
01209 
01210    double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
01211 
01212    double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
01213    double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
01214    double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
01215    double a5 = 1.0;
01216    double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
01217 
01218    double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
01219    double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
01220    double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
01221    double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
01222    double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
01223    double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
01224    double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
01225    double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
01226    double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
01227    double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
01228    double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
01229    double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
01230    double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
01231    double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
01232    double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
01233    
01234    double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
01235    double c42 = 0.0;
01236    double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
01237    double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
01238    double c45 = 0.0;
01239    double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01240 
01241    double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01242    double c52 = 0.0;  
01243    double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01244    double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01245    double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01246    double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01247 
01248    double d1 = c41 - c51;
01249    double d2 = c42 - c52;
01250    double d3 = c43 - c53;
01251    double d4 = c44 - c54;
01252    double d5 = c45 - c55;
01253    double d6 = c46 - c56;
01254 
01255    double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0, k31 = 0.0;
01256    double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0, k32 = 0.0;
01257    double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0, k33 = 0.0;
01258    double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0, k34 = 0.0;
01259    double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0, k35 = 0.0;
01260    double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0, k36 = 0.0;
01261 
01262    // Main loop
01263 
01264    double x = a;
01265    double y1 = y1a;
01266    double y2 = y2a;
01267    double y3 = y3a;
01268 
01269    double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01270 
01271    double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01272 
01273    while(x < b)
01274    {   
01275       // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01276 
01277       hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01278 
01279       if(h < hmin)
01280       {
01281          std::cout << std::endl
01282                    << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01283                    << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01284                    << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01285                    << std::endl;
01286 
01287        h = hmin;
01288       }
01289 
01290       if(x + h > b)
01291       {
01292          h = b - x;
01293       }
01294 
01295       // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01296 
01297       k11 = h*f1(x, y1, y2, y3);
01298       k21 = h*f2(x, y1, y2, y3);
01299       k31 = h*f3(x, y1, y2, y3);
01300 
01301       k12 = h*f1(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31);
01302       k22 = h*f2(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31);
01303       k32 = h*f3(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31);
01304 
01305       k13 = h*f1(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32);
01306       k23 = h*f2(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32);
01307       k33 = h*f3(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32);
01308 
01309       k14 = h*f1(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33); 
01310       k24 = h*f2(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33); 
01311       k34 = h*f3(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33); 
01312 
01313       k15 = h*f1(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34); 
01314       k25 = h*f2(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34); 
01315       k35 = h*f3(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34); 
01316 
01317       k16 = h*f1(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35);
01318       k26 = h*f2(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35);
01319       k36 = h*f3(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35);
01320 
01321       // Error estimate
01322 
01323       error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01324       error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01325       error3 = fabs(d1*k31+d2*k32+d3*k33+d4*k34+d5*k35+d6*k36);
01326 
01327       error = 0.0;
01328       if(error1 > error)
01329       {
01330          error = error1;
01331       }
01332       if(error2 > error)
01333       {
01334          error = error2;
01335       }
01336       if(error3 > error)
01337       {
01338          error = error3;
01339       }
01340       if(error <= tolerance)
01341       {
01342          x += h;
01343 
01344          y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01345          y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01346          y3 += c51*k31+c52*k32+c53*k33+c54*k34+c55*k35+c56*k36;
01347 
01348          tempX[count] = x;
01349          tempY1[count] = y1;
01350          tempY2[count] = y2;
01351          tempY3[count] = y3;
01352 
01353          count++;
01354 
01355          if(error != 0.0)
01356          {
01357             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01358          }
01359 
01360          if(count >= size)
01361          {
01362             std::cout << std::endl
01363                       << "Flood Error calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01364                       << "Insufficient memory reserved." << std::endl
01365                       << std::endl;
01366 
01367             exit(1);
01368          }
01369       }
01370       else
01371       {
01372          h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);      
01373       }
01374    } // end while loop   
01375 
01376    Vector<double> newX(count);
01377    Vector<double> newY1(count);
01378    Vector<double> newY2(count);
01379    Vector<double> newY3(count);
01380 
01381    for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01382    {
01383       newX[i] = tempX[i];
01384       newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01385       newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01386       newY3[i] = tempY3[i];
01387    }
01388 
01389    xOut = newX;
01390    y1Out = newY1;
01391    y2Out = newY2;
01392    y3Out = newY3;
01393 
01394    return(count);
01395 }

01398 // int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(Vector<double>&,
01399 // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&,
01400 // double (*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01401 // double (*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01402 // double (*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01403 // double (*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01404 // double, double, double, double, double, double) method

01435 
01436 int OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(
01437 Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& y1Out, Vector<double>& y2Out, Vector<double>& y3Out, Vector<double>& y4Out,
01438 double (*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01439 double (*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01440 double (*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01441 double (*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01442 double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a)
01443 {
01444    double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0, error3 = 0.0, error4 = 0.0;
01445 
01446    int size = initialSize;
01447 
01448    int count = 0;
01449 
01450    Vector<double> tempX(size);
01451    Vector<double> tempY1(size);
01452    Vector<double> tempY2(size);
01453    Vector<double> tempY3(size);
01454    Vector<double> tempY4(size);
01455 
01456    tempX[0] = a;
01457 
01458    tempY1[0] = y1a;
01459    tempY2[0] = y2a;
01460    tempY3[0] = y3a;
01461    tempY4[0] = y4a;
01462 
01463    count++;
01464 
01465    double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
01466 
01467    double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
01468    double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
01469    double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
01470    double a5 = 1.0;
01471    double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
01472 
01473    double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
01474    double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
01475    double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
01476    double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
01477    double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
01478    double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
01479    double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
01480    double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
01481    double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
01482    double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
01483    double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
01484    double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
01485    double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
01486    double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
01487    double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
01488    
01489    double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
01490    double c42 = 0.0;
01491    double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
01492    double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
01493    double c45 = 0.0;
01494    double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01495 
01496    double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01497    double c52 = 0.0;  
01498    double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01499    double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01500    double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01501    double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01502 
01503    double d1 = c41 - c51;
01504    double d2 = c42 - c52;
01505    double d3 = c43 - c53;
01506    double d4 = c44 - c54;
01507    double d5 = c45 - c55;
01508    double d6 = c46 - c56;
01509 
01510    double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0, k31 = 0.0, k41 = 0.0;
01511    double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0, k32 = 0.0, k42 = 0.0;
01512    double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0, k33 = 0.0, k43 = 0.0;
01513    double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0, k34 = 0.0, k44 = 0.0;
01514    double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0, k35 = 0.0, k45 = 0.0;
01515    double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0, k36 = 0.0, k46 = 0.0;
01516 
01517    // Main loop
01518 
01519    double x = a;
01520    double y1 = y1a;
01521    double y2 = y2a;
01522    double y3 = y3a;
01523    double y4 = y4a;
01524 
01525    double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01526 
01527    double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01528 
01529    while(x < b)
01530    {   
01531       // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01532 
01533       hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01534 
01535       if(h < hmin)
01536       {
01537          std::cout << std::endl
01538                    << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01539                    << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01540                    << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01541                    << std::endl;
01542 
01543        h = hmin;
01544       }
01545 
01546       if(x + h > b)
01547       {
01548          h = b - x;
01549       }
01550 
01551       // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01552 
01553       k11 = h*f1(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01554       k21 = h*f2(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01555       k31 = h*f3(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01556       k41 = h*f4(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01557 
01558       k12 = h*f1(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01559       k22 = h*f2(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01560       k32 = h*f3(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01561       k42 = h*f4(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01562 
01563       k13 = h*f1(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01564       k23 = h*f2(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01565       k33 = h*f3(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01566       k43 = h*f4(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01567 
01568       k14 = h*f1(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01569       k24 = h*f2(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01570       k34 = h*f3(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01571       k44 = h*f4(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01572 
01573       k15 = h*f1(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01574       k25 = h*f2(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01575       k35 = h*f3(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01576       k45 = h*f4(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01577 
01578       k16 = h*f1(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01579       k26 = h*f2(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01580       k36 = h*f3(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01581       k46 = h*f4(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01582 
01583       // Error estimate
01584 
01585       error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01586       error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01587       error3 = fabs(d1*k31+d2*k32+d3*k33+d4*k34+d5*k35+d6*k36);
01588       error4 = fabs(d1*k41+d2*k42+d3*k43+d4*k44+d5*k45+d6*k46);
01589 
01590       error = 0.0;
01591       if(error1 > error)
01592       {
01593          error = error1;
01594       }
01595       if(error2 > error)
01596       {
01597          error = error2;
01598       }
01599       if(error3 > error)
01600       {
01601          error = error3;
01602       }
01603       if(error4 > error)
01604       {
01605          error = error4;
01606       }
01607       if(error <= tolerance)
01608       {
01609          x += h;
01610 
01611          y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01612          y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01613          y3 += c51*k31+c52*k32+c53*k33+c54*k34+c55*k35+c56*k36;
01614          y4 += c51*k41+c52*k42+c53*k43+c54*k44+c55*k45+c56*k46;
01615 
01616          tempX[count] = x;
01617          tempY1[count] = y1;
01618          tempY2[count] = y2;
01619          tempY3[count] = y3;
01620          tempY4[count] = y4;
01621 
01622          count++;
01623 
01624          if(error != 0.0)
01625          {
01626             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01627          }
01628 
01629          if(count >= size)
01630          {
01631             std::cout << std::endl
01632                       << "Flood Error calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01633                       << "Insufficient memory reserved." << std::endl
01634                       << std::endl;
01635 
01636             exit(1);
01637          }
01638       }
01639       else
01640       {
01641          h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);      
01642       }
01643    } // end while loop   
01644 
01645    Vector<double> newX(count);
01646    Vector<double> newY1(count);
01647    Vector<double> newY2(count);
01648    Vector<double> newY3(count);
01649    Vector<double> newY4(count);
01650 
01651    for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01652    {
01653       newX[i] = tempX[i];
01654       newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01655       newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01656       newY3[i] = tempY3[i];
01657       newY4[i] = tempY4[i];
01658    }
01659 
01660    xOut = newX;
01661    y1Out = newY1;
01662    y2Out = newY2;
01663    y3Out = newY3;
01664    y4Out = newY4;
01665 
01666    return(count);
01667 }
01668
